dcterms:description: A dataset for panoramic human activity recognition, containing diverse human activities across different scales, from individual actions to social group and global activities in crowded panoramic scenes.
dcterms:title: JRDB-PAR

dcterms:creator: R. Martin-Martin
M. Patel
H. Rezatofighi
A. Shenoi
J. Gwak
E. Frankel
A. Sadeghian
S. Savarese
dcterms:description: A dataset and benchmark for egocentric robot visual perception of humans in built environments, providing a comprehensive resource for evaluating visual perception systems.
dcterms:title: JRDB

dcterms:creator: M. Ehsanpour
F. Saleh
S. Savarese
I. Reid
H. Rezatofighi
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for spatio-temporal action, social group, and activity detection, designed to facilitate research in understanding complex interactions in videos.
dcterms:title: JRDB-act
